alert.note: Alert for Marin; San Francisco (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 5:22AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern California, including the following counties, Marin and San Francisco. * WHEN...Until 830 AM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 520 AM PST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.1 and 0.4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.1 to 0.4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Francisco, Daly City, Mill Valley, Corte Madera, Tiburon, Sausalito, Tamalpais-Homestead Valley, Strawberry, Tamalpais- Homestead, Muir Beach and Belvedere. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
